title: [BUG] End Game Screen
body: When i end the game and click the CONTINUE button it brings me the end game screen.. But there is not stats,results,etc... There is a button RECONNECT..

replies.body: Good to know, thanks for the feedback! We can get to this type of problems faster if you report them through the feedback tool within the client. Thanks for testing the alpha!
I've gotten this screen as well, some sort of disconnect between conclusion of the game and what would be arrival at the post-game summary chat. Not every time, but every day.
